ygData.subject: Re: Kunark for Lower Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s a question I was going to post!  I m currently level 14 and have been thinking heavily of travelling to Kunark.  At the moment, my druid hubby and I
ygData.messageBody:
--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Kevin Blomseth" <gerbilb@h...> wrote:
> I was just wondering if there was anyplace in Kunark where those
> around Level 13 could hunt. Oasis is always crowded, and a lot of
> other places are inconvienent (Lavastorm).
>
> Waladen
> Bard of 13 Songs
> Luclin


That's a question I was going to post! I'm currently level 14 and
have been thinking heavily of travelling to Kunark. At the moment, my
druid hubby and I are taking a whirlwind tour of Antonica to gather my
upcoming songs (up to level 18) and to have a taste of what the
continent has to offer before taking the long boat ride. We fought in
N. Karana the last couple of days, and will probably go visit
Lavastorm next. We fought plenty of caimans in the Oasis at level 12,
so will probably not visit there this time around. Our plans in
Kunark are to travel to the Fields of Bone. I just hope we survive
the run getting there.

Waladen, as I am also on Luclin, send me a tell. Who knows, maybe we
can venture into Kunark together?

Adagia, Wood Elf Bard of 14 songs
Luclin
